synopsis.text: Hifumi, in a desperate attempt to escape a group of relentless thugs, stumbles upon the unlikely rescue team of Sakamaki Izayoi, Kasukabe You, and Kudou Asuka, collectively known as the No Names. As it turns out, Hifumi possesses a unique ability to locate water sources, making her a valuable target for a community of slave traders. The No Names intervene, using Deen to protect Hifumi from the slave traders. The group's journey leads them to a dried-up hot spring, where they join forces with Kuro Usagi, Lili, and Letitia. To restore the hot spring to its former glory, the group must win a Gift Game, with the enticing reward of a luxurious soak in the rejuvenated waters. This OVA is bundled with the eighth volume of the light novel, offering a thrilling continuation of the story.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
